meanings.definition: A written account of another person's life.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading biographies to learn about famous people.
meanings.sent2: The library has a section dedicated to biographies of historical figures.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that his cat's biography would be a bestseller.
meanings.sent4: Her biography of the mountain climber was as thrilling as an adventure novel.
meanings.sent5: The biographies on the shelf painted vivid pictures of diverse lives.

meanings.definition: The written history of a person's life.
meanings.sent1: Biographies provide valuable insights into the past.
meanings.sent2: Students often study biographies to understand different time periods.
meanings.sent3: The biography of the ancient king was like a treasure trove of stories.
meanings.sent4: Her words wove together a biography of the town's founding father.
meanings.sent5: The biographies in the museum showcased the richness of history.

meanings.definition: An account of a person's life written by someone else.
meanings.sent1: She wrote biographies of famous artists for the art magazine.
meanings.sent2: Biographies written by close friends offer unique perspectives.
meanings.sent3: The biography penned by the detective added a twist to the case.
meanings.sent4: His biographies of the actors captured the essence of their personalities.
meanings.sent5: The biographies shared by the group members revealed surprising details.
